title: I’ve Been Sleeping on Fresco. Here’s Why!
description:
Pre-order the Lenovo Yoga Book 9i at BestBuy https://go.magik.ly/ml/1tutf/
#ad #BestBuyPartner @bestbuy #Windows11Pro 

I've always liked drawing in Fresco, but I was hesitant to recommend it because of the monthly subscription price. But I was so wrong. First the freee version is fully featured, I didn't realize that. And on the iPad it's only $10 a year.

If you want to learn about all of Fresco's cool features, I recommend @chris-piascik channel. He's got some great tutorials over there that really helped me understand how animation works in the app.

Discounts for my Courses  http://bradsartschool.com
